Chinese.Description:
炸弹投出后不会再因为碰撞爆炸，而是在接近任意生物或速度接近静止时爆炸。
主动触发后，将玩家身边的炸弹转化为本轮回生效的地雷，地雷只会被玩家外的生物触发。抓起地雷来拆除使其变为普通炸弹。

English.Description: All bombs turn into mines. When creatures (other than your slugcat) step on them, they blow up. When thrown, they bounce off walls, but explode on creature hits or upon losing momentum. Landmines can be defused into normal bombs.
